full_text: As President Erdogan’s party has accumulated power and audacity, it has eroded the institutional constraints that once ensured economic stability, including the autonomy of Turkey's central bank https://t.co/J3zeD5C0aT

localize.full_text: 随着埃尔多安总统的政党积累了权力和胆量，它已经侵蚀了曾经确保经济稳定的制度约束，包括土耳其中央银行的自主权https://t.co/J3zeD5C0aT。
